title.description: Deprecated. Get this data from the target object.

description.description: Deprecated. Get this data from the target object.

imageHash.description: Deprecated. Get this data from the target object.

faviconHash.description: Deprecated. Get this data from the target object.

anytype.model.Block.Content.Bookmark.title: Bookmark
anytype.model.Block.Content.Bookmark.description: Bookmark is to keep a web-link and to preview a content.

source.description: can be set for detached(without TargetObjectId) inline sets

activeView.description: do not generate changes for this field

TargetObjectId.description: empty for original set/collection objects and for detached inline sets

value.title: Value
value.description: `Value` represents a dynamically typed value which can be either null, a number, a string, a boolean, a recursive struct value, or a list of values. A producer of value is expected to set one of these variants. Absence of any variant indicates an error. The JSON representation for `Value` is JSON value.

format.title: Relation Format
format.description: RelationFormat describes how the underlying data is stored in the google.protobuf.Value and how it should be validated/sanitized

width.description: the displayed column % calculated based on other visible relations

items.title: Value
items.description: `Value` represents a dynamically typed value which can be either null, a number, a string, a boolean, a recursive struct value, or a list of values. A producer of value is expected to set one of these variants. Absence of any variant indicates an error. The JSON representation for `Value` is JSON value.

format.title: Relation Format
format.description: RelationFormat describes how the underlying data is stored in the google.protobuf.Value and how it should be validated/sanitized

relations.description: relations fields/columns options, also used to provide the order

coverRelationKey.description: Relation used for cover in gallery

pageLimit.description: Limit of objects shown in widget

defaultTemplateId.description: Default template that is chosen for new object created within the view

defaultObjectTypeId.description: Default object type that is chosen for new object created within the view

anytype.model.Block.Content.Div.title: Div
anytype.model.Block.Content.Div.description: Divider: block, that contains only one horizontal thin line

anytype.model.Block.Content.Layout.title: Layout
anytype.model.Block.Content.Layout.description: Layout have no visual representation, but affects on blocks, that it contains. Row/Column layout blocks creates only automatically, after some of a D&D operations, for example

anytype.model.Block.Content.Link.title: Link
anytype.model.Block.Content.Link.description: Link: block to link some content from an external sources.

marks.description: list of marks to apply to the text

iconImage.description: in case both image and emoji are set, image should has a priority in the UI

range.description: range of symbols to apply this mark. From(symbol) To(symbol)

anytype.model.Range.title: Range
anytype.model.Range.description: General purpose structure, uses in Mark.

key.description: Key under which the value is stored in the map. Must be unique for the object type. It usually auto-generated bsonid, but also may be something human-readable in case of prebuilt types.

format.title: Relation Format
format.description: RelationFormat describes how the underlying data is stored in the google.protobuf.Value and how it should be validated/sanitized

name.description: name to show (can be localized for bundled types)

defaultValue.title: Value
defaultValue.description: `Value` represents a dynamically typed value which can be either null, a number, a string, a boolean, a recursive struct value, or a list of values. A producer of value is expected to set one of these variants. Absence of any variant indicates an error. The JSON representation for `Value` is JSON value.

hidden.description: internal, not displayed to user (e.g. coverX, coverY)

readOnly.description: value not editable by user tobe renamed to readonlyValue

readOnlyRelation.description: relation metadata, eg name and format is not editable by user

multi.description: allow multiple values (stored in pb list)

objectTypes.description: URL of object type, empty to allow link to any object

selectDict.description: index 10, 11 was used in internal-only builds. Can be reused, but may break some test accounts  default dictionary with unique values to choose for select/multiSelect format

maxCount.description: max number of values can be set for this relation. 0 means no limit. 1 means the value can be stored in non-repeated field

revision.description: revision of system relation. Used to check if we should change relation content or not

includeTime.description: indicates whether value of relation with date format should be processed with seconds precision

anytype.model.Relation.title: Relation
anytype.model.Relation.description: Relation describe the human-interpreted relation type. It may be something like "Date of creation, format=date" or "Assignee, format=objectId, objectType=person"

relationKey.description: 4 is reserved for old relation format  stored

format.title: Relation Format
format.description: RelationFormat describes how the underlying data is stored in the google.protobuf.Value and how it should be validated/sanitized
